title: Constructivist-Based Project Development for Designing Digital Youth Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational understanding of STEAM disciplines
context.additional_context: A Program Supporting Professionals in Medical, Legal, and Technical Fields to Design Adolescents' Learning Experiences in Digital Environments, with a Focus on Implementing Choice-Based Learning Activities in Smartphone-Centric, Resource-Limited Settings

learning_goals: Learners can design digital learning modules based on constructivist principles
Learners develop choice-centered learning pathways reflecting adolescents' diverse interests
Learners implement project-based assessment tools executable in smartphone environments
Learners create learning scenarios integrating broad concepts across STEAM disciplines

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
